name: Cricket Kid
description:
Bat your way around the world!


Start out in India and work your way around the world seeing the Taj Mahal, Statue of Liberty, the Eiffel Tower, the Pyramids and so many more!

Hit your ball as far as possible by upgrading the power and bounce. The harder you hit it, the more coins you earn, allowing you to progress further and further.

Unlock and equip cool hats, bats, balls and clothing as you reach new locations, can you unlock them all?


Get ready for some endless Cricket fun!
